means.word_mean: 1. a mountain peak in the southern Sinai Peninsula (7,500 feet high); it is believed to be the peak on which Moses received the Ten Commandments
2. a desert on the Sinai Peninsula in northeastern Egypt
3. a peninsula in northeastern Egypt; at north end of Red Sea
